items.sentence: It looks like Tom was able to get what he wanted.
Tom is looking for someone to take Mary\'s place.
She explained to him why she couldn\'t visit him.
Tom was unwilling to do what we wanted him to do.
Tom was wearing a black hat when I first met him.
Tom washes his hair every time he takes a shower.
Tom loves himself more than he loves anyone else.
Tom managed to finish writing his report in time.
Tom needed to be transferred to another hospital.
Tom never thought that Mary would commit suicide.
Tom persuaded Mary not to go swimming by herself.
I never thought I\'d be happy to hear your voice.
I shouldn\'t have drunk that last bottle of beer.
Who\'ll be the next class president, Tom or Mary?
Who\'s your favorite left-handed baseball player?
Tom pulled a flashlight out of his jacket pocket.
Tom pulled out a sandwich from a brown paper bag.
Tom put a gun to his head and pulled the trigger.
Tom put a kettle full of water on the small fire.
Tom is older than any other student in his class.
Tom is one of the hardest guys to get along with.
Tom is one of the most respected men in our town.
Tom is one of the wealthiest people in the world.
Tom is our oldest child and Mary is the youngest.
Tom is overweight, but not as overweight as Mary.
Tom rides his bicycle to the beach every weekend.
Tom teaches history at the school near our house.
Tom usually does his homework right after dinner.
Tom wanted to become a sign language interpreter.
Tom was living in Australia when the war started.
My parents were living in Boston when I was born.
My sister usually goes to the park every weekend.
My sister will be thirteen years old next summer.
My sixty-year-old aunt inherited the huge estate.
My younger brother swims every day in the summer.
Neptune is the eighth planet of the solar system.
What time do you usually take your afternoon nap?
What was I wearing at that time? Do you remember?
What will the Japanese economy be like next year?
When I got home, I realized I had lost my wallet.
When the big earthquake occurred, I was just ten.
When was the last time you went fishing with Tom?
Where is the cheapest place to live in Australia?
Which do you like better, white wine or red wine?
All of my kids want to learn how to speak French.
Apparently, the murder happened in a locked room.
Are you going to give Tom anything for Christmas?
Are you really going to go to Boston by yourself?
Are you really going to go to Boston next summer?
I\'d like to leave this town and never come back.
